sprint_goal: Establish a secure application foundation with a functional user login system. Users can be authenticated against a secure, encrypted database.
Implement core user and system administration. Admins can manage users, and a comprehensive audit trail is established for all actions.
Enable core DICOM data flow. The system can now receive and store studies from external modalities, and user sessions are secured with an auto-lock feature.
Deliver the core clinical value: A high-performance DICOM viewer. Users can open, view, and manipulate images for clinical review.
